title: How to Properly Use a Fusion Rifle in Destiny

steps.headline: Equip a fusion rifle from the character menu.
Wait for it to materialize in your hands, and check to see if it has ammo.
steps.description: If it doesn't, pick some up (in story mode, pick up ammo from fallen enemies. In the Crucible, there are ammo crates placed throughout the map).

steps.headline: Charge the fusion rifle.
steps.description: You can charge it by pressing and holding "RT".

steps.headline: Aiming at an enemy, let go of "RT".
steps.description: The blast will do a significant amount of damage.

text: Equip a fusion rifle from the character menu.  Wait for it to materialize in your hands, and check to see if it has ammo. If it doesn't, pick some up (in story mode, pick up ammo from fallen enemies. In the Crucible, there are ammo crates placed throughout the map). Charge the fusion rifle. You can charge it by pressing and holding "RT". Aiming at an enemy, let go of "RT". The blast will do a significant amount of damage.
